DOC.brief_summary: This study involve emergency department outpatient clinic David Grant United States Air Force ( USAF ) Medical Center , tertiary care facility . Patients 18 year age old acute respiratory tract symptom positive chest radiographs October 1 , 2004 May 31 , 2005 include positive case . Controls randomly select review negative chest radiograph report clinical history acute respiratory illness time period . Equivocal radiograph treat positive case . Patients exclude age 18 suspected case hospital-acquired aspiration pneumonia . The six clinical indicator include cough , sputum production , temperature , heart rate , respiratory rate , finding physical examination . Abnormal vital sign define temperature 100.5 degree Fahrenheit ( 38 degree Celsius ) great , heart rate great equal 100 beat per minute , respiratory rate great 20 breath per minute . Positive physical examination finding consist presence crackle , decrease breath sound , dullness percussion , egophony , rhonchus .
